page.title: 16SHINTY-TEANASSIE
page.content: Shinty is a popular sport in the Highlands.There are twelve players in each team and there are at least two reserves.You can also play six-a-side. Our shinty team is called Strathglass and last year we won the MacMaster Cup but Lovat won it this year. Lovat,Strathglass and Beauly are the three teams near here but there are a lot more.A caman is like a hockey stick,but it is designed so that you can use both sides. Each team has their own strip.To start a game of shinty the referee throws up the shinty ball for the centers to hit.At half-time or at any stage of the game players can come off and the reserves can go on.At the end of the match they have refreshments.The younger generation play in age groups. There are four age groups-under 12's, under 14's,under 17's and under 21's.
